VEVENT.SUMMARY;ENCODING=QUOTED-PRINTABLE: Board Meeting - closed session (via conference call)
VEVENT.DESCRIPTION;ENCODING=QUOTED-PRINTABLE: The Board of Education of Anne Arundel County will meet via conference call at 5 p.m. on Monday, March 23, 2020, for the specific purpose of voting to go into closed session, pursuant to Section 3-305(b) of the General Provisions Article of the Annotated Code of Maryland and consistent with recent guidance from the Office of the Attorney General, to conduct collective bargaining negotiations or consider matters that relate to the negotiations, discuss the development and implementation of emergency plans, and consult with counsel to obtain legal advice.=0D=0AThe public may listen to the open portion of the meeting, which will consist solely of a vote to go into closed session, by calling 605-468-8781 and entering access code 685333 followed by the pound/hashtag symbol.=0D=0AThe public may not listen to the closed session portion of the meeting.
